https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8yTPga1RA9BFsgKNFFPf7c4jELx.jpg Mina's life is turned upside down when she learns that her husband was innocent of the crime for which he was executed, so she starts a silent battle against a cynical system for her own and her daughter's sake. Ballad of a White Cow
